title: Yoshimoto Token
author: Yoshimoto Token
content: What are the chances Bitcoin goes back down to 32000 for August late month? A chance to buy in low again! Before that 100000 mark again I predict by April 2024?Was Bitcoin invented in a small north west mining town?

comments.author: sysoe
comments.body: $100K by April 2024 for me is about as high as the chances of me winning the lottery, finding a unicorn, and marrying a supermodel. But hey, anything is possible in this crazy crypto world, right?As for Bitcoin being invented in a small northwest mining town, maybe Satoshi Nakamoto is from a small northwest mining town, or maybe he is an alien from outer space. Maybe he is a unicorn or a supermodel. Maybe you're Satoshi Nakamoto. The mystery remains unsolved.
